name: Lurasidone

dosing.adult_acute: Schizophrenia: 40 mg once daily; Bipolar depression: 20 mg once daily
dosing.notes: MUST take with food (≥350 calories) - absorption increased 2-fold; take with evening meal to minimize daytime sedation

canadian_clinical.starting_dose: Schizophrenia: 40 mg with food; Bipolar depression: 20 mg with food
canadian_clinical.titration_schedule: Can increase after 1 week; adjust weekly by 20-40 mg
canadian_clinical.inpatient_strategy: Start 40-80 mg with dinner; increase to target within 1-2 weeks
canadian_clinical.outpatient_strategy: Start 20-40 mg with dinner; titrate based on response; excellent for bipolar depression

warnings: Black box warning: Increased mortality in elderly with dementia-related psychosis
MUST take with ≥350 calories - absorption dramatically reduced on empty stomach
Lower metabolic risk compared to olanzapine/quetiapine - weight neutral in many patients
Somnolence - take at bedtime with food
FDA-approved for bipolar depression (not just schizophrenia)

cautions.renal: CrCl 30-49: Max 80 mg/day; CrCl <30: Max 40 mg/day
cautions.hepatic: Moderate (Child-Pugh B): Max 80 mg; Severe (Child-Pugh C): Max 40 mg
